thread.title: This may be the slimmest wallet you’ll ever own
thread.title_full: This may be the slimmest wallet you’ll ever own

author: Tyler Lauletta (feedback@businessinsider.com)
title: This may be the slimmest wallet you’ll ever own

organizations.name: distil union wally bifold slim amazon

text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase. 
Every guy needs a solid, reliable wallet to hold his most valuable possessions. 
There are so few things that you have on your person everyday, so when it comes to your wallet, watch, and phone, it’s worthwhile to invest in something good. These are the items that you instinctively hit your pockets to check for before you leave your house, the bar, or anywhere else where your valuables might’ve shuffled around. 
There are a few companies out there making wallets we really enjoy, and today we are highlighting Distil Union . 
The company was founded in 2011 with a simple philosophy: " Get to the essence of a problem and solve it with design that’s simply useful, attractive, and considered." That philosophy shines through their work, as they make wallets that are sleek, understated, and sure to make your everyday carry a bit thinner. They're also affordable, with price points starting from just $30-$40.
If you're tired of your too-bulky wallet stretching out the back pocket of every pair of jeans you own, or if it's just time to upgrade one of the few things you use everyday, consider investing in something from Distil Union.
We've collected some of our favorites below for your perusal.
 
Distil Union Wally Bifold Slim Amazon 
The Wally Bifold Slim combines the best aspects of a wallet and money clip into one product. Open it up and you'll be able to clip in whatever cash you need to carry, and then slot in as many as 12 cards into the sides. A pull tab give you easy access to all of your most important cards.
Distil Union Wally Bifold Slim, $59.99, available at Amazon. 


Distil Union Wally Euro Amazon 
The Euro is very similar to the Bifold Slim in that it has both the interior money clip and pull tabs for easy access to your cards. What sets it apart is its squeeze lock pouch for carrying coins, perfect for anyone getting change back from a London bar.
Distil Union Wally Euro, $69.99, available at Amazon. 


Distil Union Wally Sleeve Amazon 
For the true minimalist, the Wally Sleeve is a simple leather piece with room for six cards. It's perfect for anyone who doesn't like carrying cash, or as a place to store your business cards in style.
Distil Union Wally Sleeve, $24.99, available at Amazon. 


See the rest of the story at Business Insider
